32.eng-name: The Book of Jihad and Expeditions

hadiths.text: It has been reported on the authority of Sahl b. Sa'd who said:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) came to us while we were digging the ditch and were carrying the earth on our shoulders. (Seeing our condition), he said: O God, there is no life but the life of the Hereafter. So forgive Thou the Muhajirs and the Ansar

chapter.eng-name: The Battle of Al-Ahzab (The Confederates), also known as Al-Khandaq (The Ditch)
